author: Reuters Editorial
title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St climbs as tech rebounds to end tumultuous week
text:
NEW YORK, March 29 (Reuters) - Wall Street surged on Thursday, bringing an upbeat end to a tumultuous, holiday-shortened week as technology stocks rebounded.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 311.56 points, or 1.31 percent, to 24,159.98, the S&P 500 gained 36.46 points, or 1.40 percent, to 2,641.46 and the Nasdaq Composite added 114.22 points, or 1.64 percent, to 7,063.45. (Reporting by Stephen Culp Editing by James Dalgleish)
